abilities.name: Flames Of Tartarus
info: Critical Hits inflict a Burn dealing 10% damage per second for 3 seconds. If the target has Armor, the damage and duration of the Burn is doubled.
Heavy Attacks have a 50% chance to inflict the same Burn and effect as Hades' Core Ability.

abilities.name: Well Of Souls
info: Hades Purges Indestructible Buffs from all targets hit by this attack.
Hades then deals 400% damage to all enemies in a small area around the current target.
If the target is inflicted with a Burn, they suffer 600% damage instead.
Finally, Hades inflicts a Burn dealing 10% damage per second, for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Last Laugh
info: If Hades defeats a target with his Special Ability, that target explodes, dealing 400% damage to all enemies. This ability can be retriggered by itself and enemies defeated in this way also explode and deal the same damage to all enemies.

talents.name: Panic
talents.info: Grants +20% Focus at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Pain
talents.info: Grants +20% Attack at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Spite
talents.info: On Critical Hits, Hades' attacks have a 100% chance to inflict a -10% Attack Debuff to any enemies they hit for 5 seconds. [Max Stacks: 1] On Critical Hits, Hades' attacks Purge an Attack Buff or Defense Buff for each Burn on any enemies they hit.

talents.name: Fury
talents.info: Hades' Special Ability deals an additional 200% damage. Hades' Special Ability deals an additional 100% damage to all enemies it hits for each Burn on the targeted enemy.

talents.name: Cruelty
talents.info: Each time an enemy gains Armor, Hades gains a 40% Focus Buff. [Max Stacks: 5]

talents.name: Arrogance
talents.info: Hades' Special Ability inflicts a Burn dealing 10% Damage per second for 3 seconds. All of Hades' Burns are increased by 3 second(s), for each enemy defeated by his Special Ability. [Max Stacks: 5]
